Author: newvulcan#4719
Content:
I've decided to back out of this years election process. I know only 8% of the votes have been cast and there is a fortnight to go, but I have to be realistic with being 100,000s behind, it ain't going to happen and my rolling contract with my server ends in a few days, so better I pull out, backup my server and try again next year. I can then focus my attentions on making my mining pool server work, which is close to being finished.

Please can my details be removed from the voting process, and my server will go offfline at the end of the week.

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: do I need to clear BEER chain and resync it from scratch? Doesn't seem practical.. If it syncs it syncs right ?

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
1.  is it synced
2. is your key imported
3. is there balance
4. is there UTXOs
5. if too many UTXOs, will be slower; then send balance to self and resplit
6. make sure iguana is dpow-ing (output from iguana/log will show BEER heights), run curl command from bottom of m_notary_testnet, either it returns `sucecss`, dpow was not on but now it is, or it retuns `cannot dpow a coin twice` it is already dpowing.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: 7. check debug.log for errors

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: 8. check peers `getpeerinfo` to see you have peers conencted

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: 9.  check against explorer that you are not on a fork

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
I am going to make a game blockchain based on the new paymentsCC that we can use to test it. Its using a lot of new stuff added recently. I need a list of address for people that would like to join in. 
It will probably require a fair bit of knowledge of utxos and raw transactions to be effecive at winning it. Or just luck. A decent statagey may be just using lots of random balances in hundreds of address. 
The basic idea is, there is a daily "prize" that is paid to a set of address that fall into a range on the rich list. So for example one day it would be the top 50%, and the next day the bottom 50%. But it could be something silly like 51/49 so the 2% between this range would get the entire daily mining reward. The maximum number of address that is used is 3999.  so using a balance that is too low will mean those address will not participate.
